docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 3 The Government announced today that a "pill-by-pill" search had turned up sixtyseven physicians who still had supplies of thalidomide on hand.

headline.main: U.S. Finds 67 More Doctors With Supplies of Thalidomide; Presses 'Pill-by-Pill' Search for Drug Mrs. Finkbine's Plans Are Still Secret

docs.abstract: Vatican radio restates RC Ch categorical opposition to practice, comment on US thalidomide drug case
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 3 The Government announced today that a "pill-by-pill" search had turned up sixtyseven physicians who still had supplies of thalidomide on hand.

byline.original: By MARJORIE HUNTER Special to The New York Times
